events.title: Aero 2025
events.shortDescription: 24-hour coding marathon to build innovative solutions
events.fullDescription: Join the ultimate coding challenge where teams compete to build groundbreaking applications. Work with cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with brilliant minds, and turn your ideas into reality within 24 hours.
rules: Teams must consist of 2-4 members from any college
All team members must be present during registration
Use of any programming language and framework is allowed
Projects must be original work created during the hackathon
Teams must use provided API keys and not bring pre-written code
Internet access will be provided but external hardware must be approved
Final submission must include working demo, code repository, and presentation
Judges' decision will be final and binding

rounds.name: Registration & Team Formation
rounds.description: Register your team and finalize members

rounds.name: Problem Statement Release
rounds.description: Choose from 5+ problem statements across different domains

rounds.name: Development Phase
rounds.description: 24 hours of intense coding and building

rounds.name: Final Presentation
rounds.description: Present your solution to judges (10 min presentation + 5 min Q&A)

events.title: aiml
events.fullDescription: Design and build combat robots to compete in intense battles. Test your engineering skills, strategic thinking, and robot design prowess in this action-packed competition.
rules: Robot weight must not exceed 25 kg
Maximum dimensions: 75cm x 75cm x 75cm
Autonomous or manual control allowed
No projectile weapons or liquid weapons
Sharp weapons and pneumatic systems allowed (within safety limits)
Teams must bring their own remote controls and batteries
Arena dimensions: 20ft x 20ft with metallic floor
Each match duration: 3 minutes
Weapons must pass safety inspection before competition

events.title: civil
events.fullDescription: Showcase your web design and development skills by creating beautiful, functional, and innovative websites. Focus on user experience, visual design, and technical implementation.
rules: Teams can have 1-3 members
Use any framework or technology (React, Vue, Angular, vanilla JS, etc.)
Website must be responsive and work on all devices
No pre-built templates allowed - all code must be original
Must include at least 3 pages/sections
Judging based on design, functionality, and innovation
Final submission must include live demo and code repository
Plagiarism will lead to immediate disqualification

events.title: Cyber security
events.shortDescription: Present your startup idea to investors
events.fullDescription: Have a groundbreaking business idea? Present your startup pitch to industry experts and investors. Win funding, mentorship, and the opportunity to turn your vision into reality.
rules: Teams must have 2-5 members
Startup idea must be original and innovative
Prepare 5-minute pitch presentation
Business plan must be submitted before presentation
Q&A session will follow each pitch (5 minutes)
Ideas can be from any domain (Tech, Healthcare, Education, etc.)
Financial projections must be realistic and data-backed
Teams may be asked for additional documentation

rounds.name: Preliminary Screening
rounds.description: Top 20 teams selected for pitch round

rounds.name: Pitch Presentations
rounds.description: Present to panel of investors and entrepreneurs

rounds.name: Final Round
rounds.description: Top 5 teams pitch again with refined presentations

events.title: CSE
events.shortDescription: Hands-on workshop on AI and Machine Learning
events.fullDescription: Learn the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from industry experts. Build real-world projects and understand how to implement AI solutions.
rules: Bring your own laptop with minimum 8GB RAM
Basic programming knowledge required (Python preferred)
Install required software before workshop (list will be provided)
Attendance is mandatory for certificate
Workshop materials will be provided digitally
Hands-on projects must be completed during workshop
Limited seats available - first come first serve

events.title: Gaming Tournament
events.fullDescription: Compete in the biggest gaming tournament featuring multiple popular titles. Show your gaming skills, strategies, and teamwork to become the champion.
rules: Games: BGMI, Valorant, CS:GO, FIFA, and more
Must bring your own gaming peripherals (mouse, keyboard, headset)
Team size varies by game type
Separate tournaments for each game
All players must follow game-specific rules
Fair play policy - cheating leads to disqualification
Matches will be streamed live
Participants must be present 30 minutes before match
